import React from "react"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import ava01 from "../../assets/images/ava-1.jpg"; import ava02 from "../../assets/images/ava-2.jpg"; import ava03 from "../../assets/images/ava-3.jpg"; const Testimonial = () => { const setting = { dots: true, infinite: true, autoplay: true, speed: 1000, swipeToSlide: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, slidesToShow: 2, }; return (

"I've always dreamed of visiting the historical sites of Greece, and my trip exceeded all expectations. Standing in the shadow of the Parthenon and wandering through the ruins of Delphi felt like stepping back in time

john doe

Customer

My journey into the Amazon Rainforest was the adventure of a lifetime. Guided by knowledgeable locals, I explored the dense jungle, spotting exotic wildlife like sloths, colorful macaws, and even a rare pink river dolphin

E L Thomas

Customer

A road trip along California's Pacific Coast Highway is an absolute must for any travel enthusiast. The dramatic coastline, dotted with picturesque towns like Monterey and Big Sur, offered some of the most scenic drives I've ever experienced. Highlights included exploring the vibrant city of San Francisco, wine tasting in Napa Valley, and lounging on the beaches of Santa Barbara

Cameron Blair

Customer

 ); }; export default Testimonial;
